sen.j: 鈴木 練三郎（すずき れんざぶろう、嘉永元年（1848年） - 慶応4年8月21日 (旧暦)（1868年10月6日））は、播磨国姫路出身の新選組隊士。
sen.e: Renzaburo Suzuki (1848 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Himeji, Harima Province.
Renzaburo Suzuki (1848 - Oct 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Himeji, Harima Province.
Renzaburo Suzuki (1848 - October 6, 1868) was a member of Shinsengumi (a group who guarded Kyoto during the end of Tokugawa Shogunate) from Himeji, Harima Province.
Lower commander of infantry.
sen.cmt: 「歩兵差図役下役」定訳不明です。
sen.e: Lower commander of infantry.
Lower commander of infantry.

sen.j: 慶応3年（1867年）、新選組に入隊。
sen.e: He joined Shinsengumi in 1867.
He joined Shinsengumi in 1867.
He joined Shinsengumi in 1867.

sen.j: 局長近藤勇の側近を務める。
sen.e: He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of Shinsengumi.
He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of Shinsengumi.
He served as a close retainer of Isami KONOD, Head of Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 戊辰戦争では鳥羽伏見の戦いを経て会津戦争に参戦。
sen.e: In the Boshin War, he fought in the Aizu War after fighting in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi
In the Boshin War, he fought in the Aizu War after fighting in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi
In the Boshin War, he fought in the Aizu War after fighting in the Battle of Toba-Fushimi

sen.j: 母成峠の戦いで戦死した。
sen.e: He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
sen.cmt: killed の前のスペースを削除しました。
sen.e: He was killed on the field of the Battle of Bonari-toge.
Died at 21.
Died at 21.
